activities: CareerBuilder operates websites in European countries wherein (i) job seekers submit personal information while applying for job opportunities posted online by potential employers; and (ii) potential employers, with the consent of job seekers, review personal information posted by job seekers in a resume database.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client and customer data provided online.
recoursemech: CareerBuilder has joined the Council of Better Business Bureau's BBB EU Safe Harbor, which will act as third party arbitrator for any disputes that may arise.
